name: Walrein

passive.name: Frozen Roar
passive.effect: As often as you like during your turn, you can attach an Ice Energy from your hand to any one of your Pokemon.

attacks.name: Cold Revenge
attacks.effect: If your Active Pokemon was Knocked Out during your or your opponent's last turn, this attack deals 80 damage.

attacks.name: Sheer Cold
attacks.effect: Deal 10 more damage for each damage counter on Walrein.

flavor: These giant terrors are feared by Pokemon far and wide. Spheal are delicious targets, but are mostly left alone due to their horrifying parents.
